PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-02772002-02-280,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the NOTICE OF BRANCH CLOSURE (TRUST AND LOAN COMPANIES) REGULATIONS whereby trust and loan companies will be required to give four months' notice to its customers, the public and to the Commissioner, prior to the closing of a branch located in an urban area, and six months' notice in rural areas.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0106 Publication Date: 2002-03-13
Attachments
